Artist.title: Artists of the month
Artist.subtitle: We present to you a group of names that have impressed us with their distinguished artistic works this month.
Artist.bio1: I love documenting important moments and making documentaries that tell stories in a moving way.
Artist.bio2: I love nature and spend most of my time photographing animals in their natural environments. I dream of publishing a photo book about wildlife.
Artist.bio3: I love transforming ideas into stunning digital paintings. I use the latest technology to create unique art.
Artist.bio4: I dedicate my time to painting portraits. My works express characters and capture the essence of souls.

AboutHeader.header: A world overflowing with art; designed to meet the needs of artists, art lovers, and collectors.
AboutHeader.description: Wojod is a digital intermediary platform and a large art library that contains a vast collection of photographic images and artworks, available in electronic format for purchase as digital or printed copies. We provide this through our partnerships with hundreds of artists and photographers in Saudi Arabia and the Arab world. We also offer high-quality printing service along with reliable customer service and delivery.

AboutBanner.text: Discover the beauty and depth of Arab arts through an integrated artistic experience!

AboutWhyUs.title: Why Wojod?
AboutWhyUs.subtitle: Simply because
AboutWhyUs.subtext1: About developing the art and culture sectors.
AboutWhyUs.subtext2: Digital transformation and the creative economy.
AboutWhyUs.subtext3: With the latest trends in technology, art, and marketing.
AboutWhyUs.visiontext: From the Kingdom to the Arab world, we aim to be the leading model and trusted destination in the field of digital image display and on-demand art prints, becoming a driving force in making art an essential part of individual and community lifestyle, moving beyond mere visual appreciation to a deeper understanding of its impact on various aspects of daily life.
AboutWhyUs.missiontext: From the Gulf to the Ocean, we work to unite our artists under one umbrella, offering individuals and companies a broad space to display, acquire, and print unique and diverse visual arts that captivate them, satisfy their tastes, and meet all their needs, whatever the occasion.

AboutApproach.title: Our Approach
AboutApproach.card1text: Custom prints on high-quality materials, using modern techniques to offer a more sustainable model for art and contribute to environmental protection.
AboutApproach.card2text: Wojod acts as an intermediary platform that combines two integrated services (sale of digital media and on-demand printed works), taking on all logistical burdens on behalf of its clients.
AboutApproach.card3title: Everything You Need in One Place :
AboutApproach.card3text: Images, illustrations, vectors, posters, and more; licensed, high-resolution, and ready for use in various contexts.

PublishHeader.title: Share Your Art in Minutes...
PublishHeader.subtitle: We are pleased to have you join our platform, which allows you to share your unique art with customers worldwide, joining an elite of artists who share your vision and values, and track your sales directly.

PublishDesc.text: Wojod is not just a platform; it’s a world overflowing with art, specially designed to meet the needs of artists, art lovers, and collectors. Whether you are looking to sell digital, printable content or purchase these unique artworks, Wojod offers you, whether artist or buyer, a marketplace to display and acquire a carefully curated collection of digital and printed content. Wojod invites you to explore the beauty and depth of the human experience through a seamless and inspiring online experience!

PublishCards.card1text: Allows you to manage your profile and artworks, track sales and earnings, and access reports to understand and enhance your content’s performance on the platform.
PublishCards.card2text: Receive your earnings regularly and automatically, efficiently managing your income.
PublishCards.card3text: Expand your influence by showcasing your artwork to a larger audience without geographical restrictions.
PublishCards.card4text: Provides greater flexibility in presenting your artwork and expanding your customer base.
